attributes.action: create moral and compassionate policing in Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
STOP THE VICTIMIZATION BY SOME POLICE FORCES TOWARDS THE INNOCENT VICTIMS OF CRIME.
THIS IS A DOUBLE TRAVESTY AGAINST TRUE JUSTICE!

BRING BACK A SOLID POLICE FORCE THAT OPERATES WITH A MORAL CODE, INTEGRITY AND COMPASSION FOR THE VICTIMS OF CRIME.

END THE PRACTISE OF SOME POLICE SIDING WITH THE THUGS.

END THE PRACTISE OF SOME POLICE TURNING A “BLIND EYE” TO STREET CRIME.

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
